actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To authorize grants for certain water and waste disposal facility projects in rural areas.
short_title: Mahoning Valley Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2001
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Mahoning Valley Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for FY 2002 for: (1) a project for the extension of waterlines in Milton Township and Craig Beach Village, Ohio; and (2) sewer line projects in rural communities in Trumbull County, Ohio.

titles.title: Mahoning Valley Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2001
To authorize grants for certain water and waste disposal facility projects in rural areas.
